QuestData.Title: Critical Condition
QuestData.Description: We may have won the first battle, but a critical task still remains.$B$BDozens of Skyfire pilots were shot down during the initial aerial battle.$B$BWithout medical aid, their condition will deteriorate over time, until they finally perish. We are their only hope for survival.$B$BGo into the orchard and revive as many pilots as you can find.$B$BWe will leave no one behind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Revive 6 Wounded Pilots in Paw'don Glade. You can also use healing spells or bandages to revive them.
QuestData.CompletionText: We will remember all the brave Alliance soldiers who fell today. Though they can no longer continue, we carry the fight onward.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. Those soldiers will live and fight another day because of your efforts.
